name: The Cuadratic Adventures of McSquare
description:
The Cuadratic Adventures of McSquare

McSquare wants an adventure!

This is a tiny prototype I made to learn to use Godot Engine, and my first game ever!

Every aspect of the game was made by myself, except for the music and the coin sfx that doesn't have copyright.

Any feedback is appreciated  :)

Controls:

Left = left key

Right = right key

Jump = up key / spacebar

Exit = esc

Made with Godot Engine.
